statusDetails.updateEmailInfoText: If you haven't received the email, please {re-enter your contact details}.
statusDetails.vtfPartialVerifiedMessage: Some guests haven't been Verified to Fly. Please continue to the airport as usual, and we'll check your documents there.
statusDetails.nonVerifiedFooterText: You'll receive an email from verifiedtofly@shannun.ae when you've been Verified to Fly. Make sure to check your spam folder.

v2fReturnning.documentListHeading: Before you fly to {destination}, you must:
v2fReturnning.footerText:
We're processing your travel documents. You'll receive an email when you've been Verified to Fly.

Make sure to check your spam folder.

This is an optional service to improve your airport check-in experience. You can still proceed to the airport if you haven't been Verified to Fly.

 

Due to the complexity of COVID-19 restrictions, all regulations are provided in English only.

Did we miss something or do you have an issue? Let us know. opens in new window
v2fReturnning.title: Get Verified to Fly for your flight from {origin} to {destination} on {departureDate}

statusDetails.verifiedFooterText:
Once check-in opens, please check in online to get your boarding pass and head to our Verified to Fly airport desk.

\r\n
statusDetails.verifiedInfoText: Your travel documents have been processed:

afterUpload.footerText:
You'll receive an email when you've been Verified to Fly. Make sure to check your spam folder.

This is an optional service to improve your airport check-in experience. You can still proceed to the airport if you have't been Verified to Fly.

Due to the complexity of COVID-19 restrictions, all regulations are provided in English only.

Did we miss something or do you have an issue? Let us know. opens in new window
afterUpload.heading: Thanks, we're processing your travel documents.
afterUpload.title: Get Verified to Fly for your flight from {origin} to {destination} on {departureDate}

beforeOpen.documentListHeading: Before you fly to {destination}, you must:
beforeOpen.footerText: Upload your documents from 72 hours before your flight departure time to be Verified to Fly.
beforeOpen.title: Get Verified to Fly for your flight from {origin} to {destination} on {departureDate}

viewRequirments.footerText: To be Verified to Fly, each passenger on your booking will need to upload their documents from 72 hours before flight departure time and provide the following
viewRequirments.description: Each passenger on your booking will need to provide the following:
viewRequirments.title: COVID-19 documents for travelling from {origin} to {destination}

multiTrip.footerText: Verified to Fly opens 48 hours before your flight departure time. You can only upload your documents after travelling on your outbound flight.
multiTrip.description: To be Permitted to fly to {destination}, you must:
multiTrip.title: Inbound: Get Verified to Fly for your flight from {origin} to {destination} on {departureDate}

statusDetails.messageBeforeMaxTime:
Verified to Fly opens seven days before your flight. Please check back then.

Check what documents you need

afterOpen.footerText:
Please upload your travel documents from 72 hours before you fly.

Due to the complexity of COVID-19 restrictions, all regulations are provided in English only.

Did we miss something or do you have an issue? Let us know. opens in new window
afterOpen.description: Before you fly to {destination}, you must:
afterOpen.title: Skip the airport queues. Get Verified to Fly for your flight from {origin} to {destination} on {departureDate}

statusDetails.vtfInprogressMessage: We're processing your travel documents and will email you when you've been Verified to Fly.

vtfClosed.footerText:
It's within six hours of your flight, please proceed directly to the airport. Your documents will be verified at the check-in desk.

\r\n
vtfClosed.title:
As it's within six hours of your flight, please proceed directly to the airport. Your documents will be verified at the check-in desk.

\r\n

statusDetails.partiallyVerifiedFooterText:
We'll send you an email to confirm when all documents have been reviewed, and you've been Verified to Fly.

\r\n

To retrieve your booking, we need your last name and your booking reference number.

Booking reference

Ticket number

Your ticket number is the 13-digit code on your e-ticket found in your booking confirmation email

  • We can only confirm your special request for your Shannun-operated flights. If you have flights with another airline, please contact them directly

items.title: Hindu meal (Non-veg)
desc:
• Contains meat (lamb or chicken), fish, eggs and dairy products
  • Does not contain any beef or beef products
  • Prepared according to subcontinent preferences (mildly spicy to spicy)
  • Suitable for members of the Hindu community

items.title: Kosher Meal (Requires 72 hours prior notice)
desc:
• Contains meat from animals that have split hooves and chew the cud, or species of fish that have both fins and scales
  • Contains fruit and vegetables
  • Certified in the kosher kitchen and double-sealed after packing

items.title: Vegetarian Jain Meal
desc:
• Contains non-root vegetables only
  • Does not contain any root vegetables like onions, ginger, garlic, potatoes, carrots or animal/ animal by-products
  • Prepared Asian style
  • Suitable for a section of the Indian community who are strict vegetarians

items.title: Vegetarian Meal
desc:
• Contains all types of fruits and vegetables
  • Does not contain any meat, fish or animal by-products (like animal fat in biscuits)
  • Does not contain dairy products

landing.mealdescription.meal-info.sectiontitle: Meals for medical and dietary needs

items.title: Asian Vegetarian Meal
desc:
• Contains all types of fruits, vegetables, and dairy products
  • Does not contain any type of meat, fish or eggs
  • Prepared according to subcontinent preferences (mildly spicy to spicy)
  • Can qualify as a Hindu meal

items.title: Bland Meal
desc:
• Contains mostly soft food that is easily digestible like mashed potatoes, spinach, soft boiled eggs, boiled meats, toast and dairy products
  • Does not contain baked or fried food, or food containing spices, onions or garlic

items.title: Diabetic Meal
desc:
• Contains minimal salt, low-fat products, high-fibre fruit and vegetables
  • Does not contain any kind of sugar (only certain permitted sugar substitutes)
  • Suitable for guests with diabetes (low insulin levels)

items.title: Fruit Platter
desc:
• Contains seasonal fruits
  • Suitable for guests who are fasting or those who prefer fresh, raw food

items.title: Gluten Free Meal
desc:
• Contains meat, poultry, fish, rice, fruit, vegetables, corn, potatoes, dairy products, chocolate, dried beans and peas
  • Contains salt and pepper, herbs and spices, sugars and preserves, margarine, tapioca and vegetable oils
  • Suitable for guests who need to limit their intake of gluten (or gliadin, a protein fraction of gluten), a substance found in wheat, barley, rye and oats

items.title: Vegetarian Lacto-Ovo Meal
desc:
• Contains dairy products</li><li>Does not contain any meat or meat products, fish, poultry or products with lard or gelatine
  • Suitable for guests who do not eat flesh of any kind but can eat milk and cheese products

items.title: Low-calorie Meal
desc:
• Contains food with plenty of roughage and with less fats and carbohydrates
  • Does not contain sugar, cream, sauces, mayonnaise or fatty meats
  • Suitable for guests on restricted or low-calorie diets

items.title: Low fat / low cholesterol meal
desc: • Contains margarine, cottage cheese, egg white, boiled rice, potatoes, lean meats, fish, wholegrain bread, cereals and fruit

items.title: Low sodium meal
desc: • Does not contain salt, MSG and baking soda/powder

items.title: Low Lactose Meal
desc:
• Contains salads, roughage, pasta, rice, fish or meat
  • Does not contain milk and milk products, sauces, soft rolls, croissants or chocolate
  • Suitable for guests who are allergic or intolerant to milk or milk products, or guests who have low lactose levels in their bodies

items.title: Raw Vegetable Meal
desc: • Contains mainly raw vegetables

items.title: Vegetarian Oriental Meal
desc:
• Contains fruit and vegetables
  • Does not contain meat, fish, eggs or dairy products
  • Prepared in Chinese style

items.title: Baby meal
desc:
• Baby meals are available on board
  • Parents are advised to carry baby foods familiar to and preferred by their babies
  • Milk or baby meals can be heated on board

items.title: Child meal (non-veg)
desc:
• Burgers, fish fingers, chicken nuggets, French fries, crisps, pizza or chocolate
  • Suitable for children between the ages of 2 to 12

xfProperties.general.consent.transfer-personal-consen:
When transferring personal data to overseas recipients, we have to inform you who they are, their contact details, country where they are based in, date and method of transfer and what personal information we export and for what purposes, and retention period of such information and obtain your consent for such transfers. You can view the list of the recipients here.

You have the right to refuse the overseas transfer of your personal data to third parties as described above. However, if you refuse, we will be unable to provide you with the service requested. Please note that we will only transfer personal data to third parties where required to provide you with the service requested, it is in your interest or we have an obligation to do so.

You can view the list of the recipients here.

You have the right to refuse the overseas transfer of your personal data to third parties as described above. However, if you refuse, we will be unable to provide you with the service requested. Please note that we will only transfer personal data to third parties where required to provide you with the service requested, it is in your interest or we have an obligation to do so.

xfProperties.sign-up-form-description: Enter your details below to join Shannun Guest and use our Chat package for free on this flight.
xfProperties.terms-and-condition-text: I agree to the terms and conditions.
xfProperties.sign-up-description: Free Wi-Fi on board and a world of benefits? Join Shannun Guest and get our Chat package for free, plus 500 bonus miles. Enter your flight details to get started.
xfProperties.sign-up-popuplink-label: Your six-character booking reference is on your booking confirmation.
xfProperties.sign-up-popup-description:
Where can I find my booking reference?

To retrieve your booking, we need your last name and your booking reference number.

Booking reference

Your ticket number is your booking reference six-character code, beginning with a capital letter.

Ticket number

Your ticket number is the 13-digit code on your e-ticket found in your booking confirmation email.
xfProperties.existing-shannun-guest-notification: You're already an Shannun Guest member. Log in to our portal on board to access free Wi-Fi.
xfProperties.quick-enrolled-guest-notification: Your Shannun Guest account has been created. Use your account details to log in to our Wi-Fi portal on board.

success-page-descriptions.default:
Thank you for signing up for Shannun Guest. Complete your registration when we land to claim 500 bonus miles.

For now, sit back, relax and click the link below to claim your free Chat package.
success-page-descriptions.airPortal:
Thank you for signing up for Shannun Guest Air portal. Complete your registration when we land to claim 500 bonus miles.

For now, sit back, relax and click the link below to claim your free Chat package.

faq-heading-items.faqItemHeading: Is Wi-Fi free for my flight?
faq-heading-items.faqItemDescription: If you are an Shannun Guest member, you can enjoy a free Chat package for the duration of your flight. In addition, all First and Shannun Guest Platinum members will receive complimentary Wi-Fi onboard. All other guests are required to purchase Wi-Fi.
